tactic: induction tr as [|[(c & v) |] tr' IHtr'].
exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 1 branch or a conjunctive pattern made of 2 patterns.

original: intros tr h i H. unfold trace_mutual_exclusion' in *. intros H'. induction tr as [|[(c & v) |] tr' IHtr']. - auto. - apply trace_mutual_exclusion'_extend_input in H'. apply IHtr' in H'. apply H'. - apply trace_mutual_exclusion'_no_out_extend. apply IHtr'. apply H'.
